summary: Skeletons in Skyrim are a joke. This mod seeks to change that.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15768-1-1335195686.jpg[/img]
Skeletons in Skyrim are a joke. This mod seeks to change that.

~ Skeleton Changes ~
Health - The asinine achromic abominations now have more health, but are still weaker than Draugr.
Damage - These backbiting bony banes now deal 50% more damage.
Stubborn - Finally, these hated hell horrors will now raise from the grave!

After they\'re dead they have a likely chance to get up after resting for a short while, however if you manage to turn them to ash, they will not raise (of course).

~ Bugs ~
None that I know of, but if any exist they will probably be hilarious.

~ Changelog ~
0.0 - The mod didn\'t exist when it was version 0
1.0 - I brought the mod into this world, and I can damn well send it straight back into hell.
1.1 - This is a future patch note, since the mod is still in 1.0 we can only speculate what this changes.
author: Jjiinx
